title: In moral topics, how genuine are your opinions and how much are you conditioned by the society rule of the politically correct? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe my opinions to be very genuine . Which has fuckall to do with political correctness. Of Course i cannot pinpoint what you mean here, but if you mean that new distorted understanding of PC, which ironically uses “im just not political correct” as a PC way of saying “im horribly racist or mysoginist or both”, im not racist but that has Nothing to do with PC. The pc do not rule Society, the most powerful man in the world is a crude asshole.

I’m guessing everyone would say their moral opinions are genuine and not conditioned by society or the “politically correct”. And, yet, I’ll bet most people are so conditioned. I feel like my opinions are genuine and not very “politically correct” at all. That doesn’t make it so.
